sub_title: Helping highly educated internationals find work in the Netherlands | Helping employers in the Netherlands find and keep talent | Want to know more? Visit üëâüèª opendutchdoors.com
summary:
I am a seasoned business development and marketing professional who has a passion for creating connections between individuals, organizations and concepts. In this, my ability to communicate with people from different layers within organizations is of great help. Add to this my genuine interest in the other and the twinkle in my eyes and you get a picture of how I operate. 

The role I am seeking compliments my natural ability to create mutually beneficial relationships between individuals and organizations. Ideally, this would be in a (parttime) job or consultancy work in business development, marketing, community development, public affairs, recruitment or employer branding. 

Open Dutch Doors is the result of my ability to both identify and act on opportunities. It helps employers find, attract and keep (inter)national talent AND it helps highly educated internationals find interesting work in the Netherlands. 

Please contact me on:
‚úâÔ∏è sandrine@opendutchdoors.com
üìû +31(0)644792148
